# Peace Russia? {#sec-peace-russia}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
Russia wants peace
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=peace&sort=relevance)
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
- Russia has started an unprovoked war and will continue conquering Europe unless stopped
- Russia even wants to conquer the US
:::

The russian empire was born fromn the learnings of the mongol empire, see @sec-russia-history. 

Rule 5 of the Mongol laws of war (Yassa) reads:

> It is forbidden to ever make peace with a monarch, a prince or a people who have not submitted.[^peace-russia-4]
